ãƒœãƒ“ãƒ¼KotickãŠæ¯ã•ã‚“ã‚’æ“ã£ã¦ã€ã‚ãªãŸãŒæ—©ãå…ˆã«å§¦é€šã—ã¦ã‹ã‚‰æ®ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’é¡˜ã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã™
not a real PVE just lies ):

I've been playing Overwatch for years. It was going downhill, but WOW 2 really put the nail in the coffin. This game is a cash grab plain and simple. Everything is overpriced in the store. EVERYTHING. I don't mind micro transactions, but when its about $20 for one skin for one character, it becomes a problem. Other games can get away with it because it's not usually a skin for just one character. Overwatch is not kind or generous in that regard at all.

The fact that the PvE mode, the entire reason for OW2 existing, has completely changed. We were lied to when the higher ups were promoting it. They never plan on releasing a good game. People will keep spending their money though. It really is a shame that Activision has a hand in this game. 

Not even to mention the terrible state the game is in. Don't get me wrong, Overwatch 1 had tons of balancing issues, but this? This feels like garbage. 

Overall, I play this game out of habit and to do something with friends. The actual gameplay is not worth anyone's time. Go play TF2 or even Paladins and you'll get a better experience.

ã€‚

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

Clueless devs in charge of game balance. They will gigabuff characters seemingly at random, make several minor, irrelevant tweaks to others, all while characters that desperately need adjustment are ignored.
Despite the devs stating that this is not their intention, counterpicking is heavily rewarded over player skill. Many games are decided in the character select menu rather than in the game. Expect frequent mirror matchups as a result. Once free content (skins, heroes, pve missions) is now either locked behind a paywall, or made incredibly tedious to unlock without paying. In the case of heroes, it hurts the competitive integrity of the game when each team does not have equal access to resources. This is also an insult to the people who have stuck by for years, only to be told they now need to insert more cash to further enjoy the game.
Overwatch 0.5. This 'sequel' is a robbery to anyone that paid for the original game.

I
Why not just call it overwatch 3 at this point, they already added several new heroes and maps since the release of overwatch 2
Most of these reviews are just people farming for points.

I sure love when an absolute sewer water tier company decides to rob me of the game I PAID FULL PRICE FOR and replace it with the fattest most disgusting scam conceivable.

[h1]Choke on my balls, Blizzard.[/h1]

Absolutely the scummiest game you will see in the last decade.
Developers don't care about the playerbase, seeing us as moneybags and nothing else, 7+ year old skins cost 15-20$ that used to be free to get with lootboxes, and they have the GALL to now charge 60$ FOR A SINGLE SKIN, 1 SKIN IS 60$. 
For that money you can get a LITERAL new AAA game.

They shut down overwatch 1 because of the promised PVE, only for them to spit in everyone's face and tell us that they scrapped the promises, because they wanted to get EVEN more money out of people, so now you have to pay 10$ for the battle pass AND 15 MORE to play the 4 ONLY 4 story missions in the game which is roughly maybe 30 min of gameplay alltogher.

The game is dying not because its bad but because Blizzard spat in our face and does NOT care about the game whatsoever they see OW2 as an investment to see how much they can get away with to reach their bottom line, it is a pure joke. And I don't even blame the developers who work hard to make this work, its the higher ups and Bobby Kotic that just want more money to themselves and nobody else and they could not care less if the hard work of these developers goes down as long as they get that sweet sweet money.

The game was dying so bad that they decided to port it to steam cuz nobody was playing overwatch, what they DIDNT know is that on battlenet, there were no review but here on steam we work on feedback, so good luck getting new players without hiding the review because it aint gonna work.
